Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments
Teaching and Learning - editorial office (13 folders)
Teaching and Learning - editorial office (13 folders)

Correspondence, notes, news clippings, press releases, drafts, printing proofs, contributor biographies, meeting minutes, and administrative materials related to the publication of "Teaching and Learning." External correspondence includes letters with contributors, vendors, and other educational and editorial institutions on subjects including the editorial process, distribution, requests for copies, and invitations to contribute. Internal correspondence involves content, staffing, contributors, and administrative matters.
